## StateManagementModule class

Responsible for configuring providers Required in root to setup core providers with the forRoot function. that configures state providers like [Reducer](./state-management.reducer.md) or [Effect](./state-management.effect.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StateManagementModule 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [forComponent(c)](./state-management.statemanagementmodule.forcomponent.md) | <code>static</code> | Configures component providers for a component store. Required even if no custom providers are neccesary |
|  [forFeature(c)](./state-management.statemanagementmodule.forfeature.md) | <code>static</code> | Configures feature providers. Only required if there are custom feature specific providers |
|  [forRoot(c)](./state-management.statemanagementmodule.forroot.md) | <code>static</code> | Configures root providers. Required even if no custom providers are neccesary. |
